  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Rompecabezas</string>
            <string language="en">Puzzles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puzzlespiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puzzles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enigmas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Puzzle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γρίφοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las soluciones de diferentes tipos de rompacabezas. Los ejemplos elegidos son de tipo geométrico y se ofrece la posiblidad de jugar con ellos así como el desarrollo de los conceptos necesarios para su comprensión.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve different types of puzzle. The examples chosen are geometrical and the unit offers the possibility of playing with them as well as learning the concepts needed to understand them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">torres de Hanoi</string>
            <string language="en">towers of Hanoi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tetrahexes</string>
            <string language="en">tetrahexes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pentominó</string>
            <string language="en">pentomino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rompecabezas</string>
            <string language="en">puzzles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grafos</string>
            <string language="en">graphs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">óvalo</string>
            <string language="en">oval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tangram</string>
            <string language="en">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, unterschiedliche Typen des Puzzlespiels zu lösen. 
Die Beispiele, die gewählt werden, sind geometrisch und die 
Maßeinheit Angebote die Möglichkeit des Spielens mit ihnen sowie das
Lernen der Konzepte, die benötigt werden, um sie zu verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre différents types de puzzle. Les 
exemples choisis sont géométriques et les offres d'unité la 
possibilité de jeu avec eux aussi bien qu'apprendre les concepts 
requis pour les comprendre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
tipos diferentes de enigma. Os exemplos escolhidos são 
geométricos e as ofertas da unidade a possibilidade de jogar com eles
as.well.as a aprendizagem dos conceitos necessitados compreendê-los.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere i tipi differenti di puzzle. Gli esempi scelti sono 
geometrici e le offerte dell'unità la possibilità di gioco con loro 
così come imparare i concetti stati necessari per capirli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τους διαφορετικούς τύπους γρίφων. Τα 
παραδείγματα που επιλέγονται έννοιες είναι γεωμετρικά και η 
μονάδα προσφέρει τη δυνατότητα με τα καθώς επίσης και τις που 
απαιτούνται για να τα καταλάβουν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufsätze von Hanoi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tetrahexes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pentomino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puzzlespiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
